snippet.title: Like a Dragon: Ishin! | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Like a Dragon: Ishin! launches February 2023 for PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows, and Steam!

In 1860s Kyo, a solemn samurai’s fight for justice stands to change the course of Japan’s history forever. Draw your blade and join the revolution in this heated historical adventure.
